::Feline::

She looked at Zardus and smiled."Commander, I have completed my 
mission and brought you a new ally.* she motioned to HotRod with her 
arms,"This is HotRod.  Former Maximal, now on our side. He will serve 
you well Zardus." She smiled and started purring, "He has the 
information in which you seek."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Sorry that I didn't post most of yesterday, but this is an insane
> time 
> in school and I'm doing some fancy time juggling.
> 
> ::Zardus/DevilDuer::
> 
> "Hold your fire, both of you!" Zardus' voice sounds as he walks 
into 
> the scene between HotRod and Unitron. He was on his way to the
> bridge, 
> still carrying Squizzy's body, and the corridor that the conflict 
was 
> in happened to be near the bridge as well.
> 
> With a silent command from Zardus, the autoguns aim themselves at 
the 
> two bots, ready to fire.
> 
> "What's going on here?" Zardus asks, looking from one bot to the 
> other.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Muttering about stupid Maximals, DevilDuer exits the CR chamber 
that 
> he had been thrown into, walking over to the nearest console to 
bring 
> up a scanner report.
> 
> His eyes light up as he sees that a new pod was near the area. Pods 
> meant new troops, which meant more help in battle, which meant that
> he 
> was gonna kill those Maximals next time he saw them!
> 
> DevilDuer walks off in an improving mood, exiting the base and
> heading 
> for t
